message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $20000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it to be of great value. Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $15000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is unfortunately below what I can accept for this product.  I'm willing to come down to $17500 to make this work. This reflects a significant discount from my initial offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value you'll receive.  Let me know if you're interested in this compromise.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I would like to counter with an offer of $16000. I hope this proposal is more in line with your expectations.
